tool_description: Analyzes the precedential authority and binding effect of cases within specified jurisdictions, considering court hierarchy and applicable law principles.

case_citations.description: Array of case citations to analyze for precedential value

target_jurisdiction.description: Jurisdiction where precedent will be applied (federal, state name, or specific court)

case_type.description: Type of legal matter: civil, criminal, administrative, constitutional

analysis_depth.description: Level of analysis: basic, detailed, comprehensive

error_messages: Invalid case citations: One or more citations are malformed or unrecognizable
Unknown target jurisdiction: Specify a valid U.S. federal or state jurisdiction
Invalid case type: Use one of [civil, criminal, administrative, constitutional]
Invalid analysis depth: Choose from [basic, detailed, comprehensive]
Too many citations: Limit analysis to 50 cases maximum per request
usage: Provide case_citations array and target_jurisdiction. Optionally specify case_type and analysis_depth. Returns authority rankings and binding analysis.

authority_scores.description: Numerical authority scores (0-100) for each case in the target jurisdiction

binding_status.description: Binding effect for each case: mandatory, persuasive, distinguishable, irrelevant

court_relationships.description: Hierarchical relationship between deciding court and target jurisdiction

recommendation_summary.description: Overall analysis summary with recommendations for case usage
